original_text: And I was afraid, and went and hid thy talent in the earth: lo, there thou hast that is thine.
korean_text: 두려워하여 나가서 당신의 달란트를 땅에 감추어 두었었나이다 보소서 당신의 것을 가지셨나이다

sentences.original_text: and went and hid thy talent
lo, there thou hast that is thine
sentences.korean_translation: 보아라, 네 것이 있는 곳에 있느니라
